Event: Trump launches a trade war during his first term targeting China with tit-for-tat levies
Trump threatens tariffs of at least 60% on all Chinese imports during campaign
Trump floats a tariff of up to 20% on all U.S. imports
Trump sworn in promises to "tariff and tax foreign countries to enrich our citizens"
Trump expects to put 25% tariffs on Canada and Mexico starting Feb 1
Trump declines to flesh out plans for taxing Chinese imports immediately
China imposes 15% tariffs on coal and LNG 10% on crude oil machinery and cars from U.S.
Trump doubles the levy on Chinese imports to 20%
Trump removes exemptions from 2018 steel tariffs raises aluminum tariffs from 10% to 25%
Trump announces "reciprocal" tariffs to match other countries' tax rates
Canada suspends second wave of retaliatory tariffs worth $125 billion Canadian after $30 billion initial tariffs
China retaliates with 15% taxes on U.S. farm products (chicken pork soybeans beef)
Trump threatens 25% tariffs on all Colombia imports after rejection of U.S. migrant flights
Colombia reverses decision accepts migrant flights after Trump's threat
Recently-postponed levies for some goods from Canada and Mexico after 30-day auto industry pause
